data.text: @DrEricDing @CDCgov @CDCDirector @kavitapmd Looks like they are firmly following the Barrington Brigade and want everyone infected. Get ready for more long covid  and losses of vulnerable people. They seem to think its all over. How shortsighted and irresponsible that is  @DrEricDing
@DrEricDing @CDCgov @CDCDirector @kavitapmd Reagan had Stockman alter the OMB to allow deficit spending, the same bureaucratic phenomenon is happening here.

@DrEricDing @BenjaminPDixon @CDCgov @CDCDirector @kavitapmd They want people to buy flights and book hotels for spring break trips and summer vacations. They need people to shop, eat out, and travel.        money > public health

@langtblu @DrEricDing @CDCgov @CDCDirector @kavitapmd I totally agree, but in the real world I have come in contact with a plumbers helper and construction guy each bragging they were sick with Covid but"missed only one day of work".
